name: next-nest-ecommerce-starter
description: A production-ready, full-stack e-commerce boilerplate. Features a monorepo structure with Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS. Includes a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions.

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter api run start:dev" "pnpm --filter web run dev"

author: Ikram Kharbouch
